title: Freezing accosiated with Jayce Ult
body: Every time Jayce switches stances with his ult I freeze, this is devastating to me because I freeze long enough for him to nail me with an empowered Q and do massive damage

replies.body: Your game files might be having trouble rendering some of the assets, such as with Jayce's ult.  I suggesting using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up.  You can download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to complete some of those steps automatically, such as running a clean repair for a fresh slate.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
